TABLE.NAME: tool_registrationrules
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains instances of registration tools and their configuration.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the rule instance's registrationtool subplugin.

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: If the rule is currently enabled.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Sort order for the registration rule.

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: Points added to the score for failing this rule.

FIELD.NAME: fallbackpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Points awarded if this rule's fallback becomes active (API not reachable, etc.)

FIELD.NAME: other
FIELD.COMMENT: Type specific configuration encoded as JSON.
